title: Identify vertical distance on graph as AFC

content.description: The following questions refer to the graph below, which shows the cost curves for a profit maximizing, perfectly competitive firm.
content.question: The vertical distance CF represents the

choices.label: total cost of producing Q1 units of output
average total cost of producing Q1 units of output
average fixed cost of producing Q1 units of output
average variable cost of producing Q1 units of output
amount of the firm's loss resulting from producing Q1 units of output

content.answer: average fixed cost of producing Q1 units of output

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
